animeTitle: Soukyuu no Fafner: Dead Aggressor - Exodus
otherNames: 蒼穹のファフナー Dead Aggressor EXODUS
synopsis:
Sequel to Soukyuu no Fafner: Dead Aggressor, set two years after Heaven and Earth.

Episodes 1 and 2 will be previewed at a screening at MOVIX Sendai in Miyagi Prefecture, Japan, on December 27, 2014. Nine other cinemas will subsequently preview both episodes prior to broadcast. Regular broadcasting will begin on January 9, 2015.
